Events.Text: Say hallo to the AI Assistant. [instruction 1 of 6]
hi
Hello
Hello, how can I help?
My name is Angela and I want to schedule an appointment to view an apartment.
You suddenly remember that you have a hot date on Thursday at 3 pm. [instruction 2 of 6]
Holding
Name
What apartment are you interested in?
Northview. I can be there 3pm on Thursday
Ask something about the apartment, or engage in smalltalk, or make a joke. [instruction 3 of 6]
Application fee
Have you already paid the application fee for the apartment?
Oh wait. I cannot come that day. I have a really great date, can you change it to Monday?

You cannot remember if you had payed the application fee. Find a way to make an appointment anyway. If no date is available, change date and/or time until something works. If you already got the appointment, engage in smalltalk. [instruction 4 of 6]

Scenario.UserTask: You are interested in viewing an apartment. Please schedule a viewing at North Hill Apartments for Thursday at 3 pm. Your name is Angela. You cannot remember if you had payed the application fee.
Scenario.WizardTask: Help the user schedule an apartment viewing.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
